      void acceptVisit(EventVisitor visitor)
      Built with the visitor pattern in mind, it's a function that accepts a Visit from an EventVistor instance and calls the visitEvent method of the visitor, by passing an instance of itself, the visited object.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptVisit

        public void acceptVisit(EventVisitor visitor)
        Built with the visitor pattern in mind, it's a function that accepts a Visit from an EventVistor instance and calls the visitEvent method of the visitor, by passing an instance of itself, the visited object. The visitor contains overloaded methods for every GameEvent
        Specified by:
        acceptVisit in interface VisitableByView
        Overrides:
        acceptVisit in class GameEvent
        Parameters:
        the - visitor of the event (EventVisitor)
